"Finally I have made it," Jason shouted, holding up a little half-blue half-white colored capsule. He was sitting next to his little lab area that was in a large closet of his apartment. Jason smiled and shook with anticipation, "By taking this, I will shrink to three inches tall and finally be able to complete my dream of becoming food for a beautiful girl or woman. It is only a matter of time before I am in the belly of a beauty." Many a night and day, Jason had fantasied about laying on the warm wet tongue of a woman, to be caressed and tasted, to be savored and then to slide down the slender female gullet, where he would await digestion in her lovely belly. Sometimes his fantasies would have variations, like he would be trapped in a girl's sandwich and be munched and crunched for her lunch. In another, he was baked in little pie with a gooey and sugary paste that was to make him sweeter. Now it could all come true with his new pill. Of coarse he knew that he could encounter obstacles like a girl or woman that wanted to keep him as a pet instead of eating him; or keeping him as a sex toy. Jason was ready, he was going to take the pill today.

Did he already have a beauty in mind to be his devourer? Or did he go somewhere and take the pill?

         It was a Saturday and Amanda had off from work. Jason had been so loud when he shouted that, she had heard him. "Come to the kitchen Jason," Amanda called to him, "Come and tell me of your new creation." Jason came in holding up the little pill and told her that it was the shrinking pill that he had said to her that he was working on. Amanda smiled, "I was hungry and was going to make lunch. So if you take that pill, in a few minutes I could decide if I want to gobble you up as part of my lunch." Jason said, "Yes you could." Amanda teasingly licked her plump red lips, "Well, take it already, let's see if it works." Jason did as she said, he got a small glass of water and swallowed the pill with it and sat the glass back down. A couple of minutes passed and nothing happened. Jason frowned and said, "Well, either it doesn't work or it will take a little bit more time...oooh." Jason started to feel a little nauseous, then he felt dizzy and blacked out. When Jason woke up, he had shrunk to three inches.

Where was he when he woke up?

132.content:
Jason climbed the second table. When he got to the top, neither of the women noticed him. The blond had a salad with ranch dressing and apple juice, and the red head was eating apple pie and had lemonade. Jason stood in between them and jumped up and down, waving his arms to get their attention. The blond screamed when she saw Jason.
"A BUG!" She yelled. She raised her hand to crush Jason, but the red head grabbed it.
"Calm down, first off, it's not hurting anything." She said.
"Yeah but-"
"Second of all, I don't think that's a bug." The blond slowly leaned in for a closer look.
"Can you two help me?" Jason asked, making the blond jump back.
"First off, what are you?" The red head asked. Jason told them who he was, and about the pill, and his dream. After he got done, they introduced themselves. The blond was Catherine and the red head was Stella.
"I will eat you Jason." Stella said, and went to grab him. Catherine had other ideas.
"No way, I will eat him, he's mine." Catherine said.
"Weren't you scared of him before though?"
"That's only because I thought he was a bug."
"What's the difference?"
"Bugs want to hurt you, Jason is harmless like food. He probably tastes really good too."
"Bugs are also harmless."
"Alright, enough, I will choose." Jason said.
"He's right and he's going to choose me. Think about it Jason, wouldn't you want to be part of my salad? You would be a healthy meal for a beautiful stomach like mine, or you could be part of my apple juice and I could drink you with my beautiful lips." Catherine said.
"I bet he will choose me. Just listen Jason, you are really sweet, like pie, so you could be part of my sweet apple pie. It's healthy and sweet, or you could be part of my lemonade. I would swirl you around, and suck you and enjoy every bit of you. Plus, I am older, therefore, I am more mature." Stella said.

"Still," he muttered to himself, "I've come this far."

With that, he scurried back to the bathroom door. There was a gap where it didn't meet the floor, and Jason was able to squeeze under it without too much trouble. Once he was outside, he straightened up and dusted himself off. When he looked up, he was struck by how different the bar seemed from his new height. The ceiling stretched on endlessly, and even as he drank in the scene, he had to jump out of the way of a foot clad in a black high heel belonging to a lady entering the bathroom. Jason considered going after her, but as he looked up at the bar, he decided that it seemed like a rather classier option.

The only problem was of course, how to get up there. Jason hurried across the floor to the bar counter, and looked it over. The outside was sheer, and even if her could climb it, there was an overhang on the edge that he had no hope of clearing. He was pondering this issue when his gaze drifted to the bartender. He watched as she reached down and pulled a bottle from behind the counter, before lifting it back up. That was his chance! Jason slipped around behind the counter, and climbed up onto it's bottom shelf. There, he waited for his chance. When he saw the bartender reach into the shelf, he took a running jump, and managed to fasten his arms around the neck of the bottle.

info.description:
(Come on people, follow the rules. I just had to delete two new additions because they broke rules 1, 3, and 5. Pay attention, follow the rules or be deleted)
Jason is a 22 year-old inventor, his greatest dream and fantasy is to be shrunken and eaten or swallowed by a beautiful girl or woman. Now is his chance, he has invented a chemical that is encapsulated in pill. When he takes the pill, he will shrink to three inches small. His goal is to as soon as he can, get a beautiful girl or woman to gobble him up.

Rules:
1.) No guys other than Jason, so no gay stuff.
2.) Jason is always to be 3 inches small; he can't be changed back. Also he will have no clothes after he shrinks.
3.) You can add other girls or women, but they have to be within the 17-34 age range.
4.) If you want to end the story, I would prefer that Jason be eaten. But if you want it doesn’t half to be that way.
5.) Editions must be at least a paragraph long. (i.e.: 7 or more good sentences.)
6.) The story is always to be written in the third person perspective; meaning, “Jason did this, or Jason slid down the girl's throat did that.”
7.) Spell and grammatical check your work; I hate having to correct poor writing. Write like you would have to for a college paper. Not like on msn-messenger.
8.)Make a creative title for all editions, don't use what it automatically puts in the blank, because that is the branch sentence that you clicked on. It will not fit or sound good. Be creative, you shouldn't be adding to this in the first place if you are not trying to be creative.
9.) No animals, insects, bugs, etc., etc.
10.)If Jason is put on a sandwich, there is to be no meat on it just him.

If you follow the rules perfectly, I won’t delete much.
